short_definition: A proposed change to a pending legislative text, such as a bill, resolution, treaty, or other amendment.
long_definition_html:
A proposed change to a pending legislative text, such as a bill, resolution, treaty, or other amendment.

Source: Congress.gov

A proposed change to a pending legislative text, such as a bill, resolution, treaty, or other amendment.

Source: [Congress.gov](http://beta.congress.gov/help/legislative-glossary)
